job.title: Founding Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a wellrounded engineer to join us in building our lowcode platform from the ground up Youll solve hard problems and help shape the future of our companyppbrppWere founded by two former Google engineers and graduated from YCs W21 batch We recently featured at Google IO and have an incredible list of supporters and advisorsppbrppstrongWhat You Will Work OnstrongpulliSpec design and build functionality in FlutterFlowliliHelp us decide what to build next You will partner with our founders and team to identify and prioritize new featuresliliWrite code that writes code We work in an interesting and challenging space that few people get to work onliliTalk to customers to understand their needsliliBe the right hand to our CTO Help solve complex problems and mentor more junior team membersliulpbrppstrongWho you arestrongpulli4 years of proffesional experience as a Software EngineerliliYou write highquality code that is readable and reliableliliYou have a startup mentality You understand shipping a feature early and learning from the result is more important than perfecting itliliSelfstarter who likes to take initiativeliliYou are more interested in getting to the right answer than being rightliliYou are driven and derive a sense of purpose from building something that mattersliliYou are always willing to roll up your sleeves and pitch in when the team needs helpliulpbrppstrongBonus Pointsstrongpulli1 years of experience with Flutter and DartliliExperience with FirebaseliliExperience with mobile app developmentliulpbrppstrongBenefitsstrongpulliLive anywhere in the USliliGenerous salary and equity packageliliFlexible Vacation  Sick LeaveliliFlexible work hoursliulpbrppstrongAbout UsstrongppWe are building a lowcode platform to dramatically improve how mobile applications are built What used to take months of development time can now be built within hours and daysppbrppWere founded by two former Google engineers and graduated from YCs W21 batch We recently featured at Google IO and have an incredible list of supporters and advisorsp
